Bitcoin Difficulty Drops: Miners Hesitant To Expand Ahead Of Halving?
entry.summary:
On-chain data shows the Bitcoin difficulty has seen a drop in the latest network adjustment, suggesting the miners have stopped their expansion.
Bitcoin Difficulty Drops 1% As Hashrate Remains Flat
The â€œdifficultyâ€ is an in-built feature of the Bitcoin network that controls how hard the miners would find it to find blocks on the chain right now. This feature exists because the BTC blockchain intends to keep its â€œblock production rateâ€ at a constant rate.
The block production rate refers to the rate at which miners find blocks on the network. As compensation for solving these blocks, the miners receive block rewards.
These rewards serve as the only way to mint more of the cryptocurrency, so the rate at which they are given out equals the production rate of the cryptocurrency itselâ€¦

entry.title: Hedge Fund Goes Long Bitcoin, Short MicroStrategy: Details
entry.summary:
Kerrisdale Capital, a hedge fund, today disclosed a nuanced investment thesis: going long on Bitcoin while concurrently taking a short position on MicroStrategy shares. This move is predicated on the assessment that MicroStrategy, which has positioned itself as a de facto Bitcoin investment vehicle, is trading at a significantly unjustified premium to the underlying cryptocurrency that primarily constitutes its value.
Long Bitcoin, Short MSTR
The hedge fundâ€™s analysis articulates, â€œShares of MicroStrategy have soared amid a recent rise in the price of Bitcoin but, as is often the case with crypto, things have gotten carried away.â€ Kerrisdale highlights a critical discrepancy, noting that MicroStrategyâ€™s stock price implies a BTC value of â€œover $177k, i.e., two and a half times the spotâ€¦

entry.title: US, UK Probe $20B Crypto Transfers Linked to Russian Exchange: Report
entry.summary: Authorities from the US and the UK are investigating cryptocurrency transactions traversing Russian exchanges. Recent revelations suggest that over $20 billion in crypto transfers have been flagged for investigation. According to a report by Bloomberg, the suspicions revolve around Moscow-based Garantex and its use of the Tether cryptocurrency. At the center of the scrutiny is Tether, a dollar-pegged stablecoin. The sizable volume of transactions sent through Garantex using Tether has raised red flags, prompting regulatory bodies to delve deeper into potential sanctions evasion and illicit financial activities. Tether Holdings Tether Holdings, the issuer of the eponymous stablecoin, finds itself entangled in the investigation. Authorities caution that unraveling the intriâ€¦

entry.summary:

The UWO is a newly introduced court order that compels individuals to disclose the source of their assets. The Minister of Public Safety and Attorney General of Canada, Mike Farnworth, said that the filing of the UWO demonstrates the governmentâ€™s commitment to taking decisive action against criminals and organized crime.
Governmentâ€™s Pursuit Of QuadrigaCX Extends

When BTC soared to $73,800 in March 2024, printing new all-time highs, the Bitcoin market reached a statistically significant level regarding on-chain unrealized profits, according to the Market Value to Realized Value (MVRV) ratio.
Bitcoin MVRV Ratio At Historically Significant Level: Time To Hold Or Take Profit?
The analytics platformÂ notesÂ that, historically, such levels have coincided with periods of market resistance. Therein, some holders often choose to take profits by exiting their positions.Â
It remains to be seen whether the same will be replicated, and prices fall as holders make a profit. However, according to MVRV, this will likely happen if past performance guides.

They also discuss his ultimate vision for Pixels and his team. Note: This interview was recorded shortly before the PIXEL token launch.

entry.title: Orangie Plays the 'Otherside' Apes Come Home Game Event With His Bored Ape
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Orangie checked out the limited-time "Apes Come Home" event in Otherside, the Bored Ape metaverse game, and got to use his own Ape avatar. Was it worth the $75K he spent for the NFT? Check out his impressions of the experience.

entry.title: 'This is the Age of Creators': How DASTAN is Fixing the 'Broken' Media Industry
entry.summary: Following the launch of decentralized media publishing company DASTAN, its President Farokh Sarmad, CEO Loxley Fernandes, and COO Quinn Button, Ph. D joined Decrypt reporter Sander Lutz and The Nifty & BoDoggos Founder and Partner Easy to talk about the future of media.

entry.title: Inside The Mind Of a Web3 Gamer
entry.summary: Saro McKenna, Co-Founder of Alien Worlds, Linda Ang, Head of Strategy at Aelf, and Sami Chlagou, CEO of Cross the Ages joined Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to explore the profile of the Web3 gamer, the evolving landscape of Web3 gaming and the transition between Web2 and Web3 gaming.
